mapper.update:
update member
member_name = #{memberName},
member_phone = #{memberPhone},
member_email = #{memberEmail},
member_address = #{memberAddress},
where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, A.* from ( select * from member A order by member_no) A) A where rnum between #{startList}+1 and #{startList}+#{listSize}
